title: RAR Concurrency : current directory virtualization.
body:
This issue is part of the RAR as a service user story: #3139.

Implement proper current directory virtualization in the RAR task + cover it with unit tests.
Checklist:
- [x] Review the RAR code and investigate which inputs should be normalized.
- [x] Normalize inputs to use absolute file paths
- [x] Review outputs and "denormalize" output paths to match previous behavior if needed.
- [x] Cover the virtualization with unit tests.

nodes.body: Work on "RAR as a service" was cut off.
